column5: i am thinking of buying a tent trailer from US was wondering what I have to have and what i have to pay when I bring it back to ontario? thanks
Are there none for sale in this country?
yea but with the dollar so strong the prices are about 2000-3000 less in the us.

Plus there are probably a lot more for sale here, my neighbor has one holding up weeds, don`t know if it was used half a dozen times, just been rotting away in their back yard. Figure 300 million here and 40-50 million up there, bargains are easier to find here.

Don't blame you one bit bowslayer.  There's lots of Canadian car dealers right now that are buying used cars in the US and bringing them up here because of the price difference and the strong Canadian dollar.  I can't answer your question, but good luck with your purchase.
Try calling the Ministry of Transportation see what they say...at least it will be legal.
